channel.title: How To Make A Fun PK Zone
channel.description: i was wondering if anyone can post a tut or link to a tut showing me how to make a safe pk spot. I'm using oldpkscape source. if anyone could help it would be appreciated.

item.title: How To Make A Fun PK Zone
item.dc:creator: @zech2005007 zech2005007
item.description:
@zech2005007 wrote:

[quote=“Rog3r, post:7, topic:227409”][quote author=skeebo link=topic=288671.msg2332117#msg2332117 date=1215934990]

public boolean funPk() { if(absX >= 2125 && absX<= 2139 && absY >= 3143 && absY <=3162) return true; else return false; }

just change the coordinates as you would for making an area nonwild.
[/quote]

One second of searching…[/quote]

still not working…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 22, 2008, 06:15:55 pm[/size][hr]any help?

Read full topic
